note.p: Naval officer. Commander of H.M.S. Arrow, 1839–44. Commander, 1844. Probably William Robinson (1800/1–64), advanced to post-captain on the retired list and living in Falmouth, Cornwall, 1860. In Falmouth, Cornwall, 1861.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1566/48/38)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 20 July 2022)
